text: is a Japanese manga series by Ryūdai Ishizaka. It was serialized online via Cygames' Cycomi manga app and website from December 2017 to May 2019 and was collected in four tankōbon volumes by Kodansha. A sequel manga by Ishizaka titled has also been serialized online via Cycomi since June 2019. It has been collected in three tankōbon volumes by Shogakukan. An anime television series adaptation by Blade titled Iwa-Kakeru! -Sport Climbing Girls- premiered in October 2020. ==Plot== Konomi Kasahara, a master at puzzles, is a first-year student who attends Hanamiya Girls' High School. While looking for a club to join, she comes across the school's climbing wall. This fateful encounter changes her life when she becomes a member of the Climbing Club. ==Characters== ; : : ; : : ; : : ; : : ; : : ; : : ; : : ; : : ; : : ; : : ; : : ; : : ; : : ; : : ; : : ; : : ; : : ==Media== ===Manga=== Iwa-Kakeru! Climbing Girls is written and illustrated by Ryūdai Ishizaka. The series was serialized online via Cygames' Cycomi manga app and website from December 5, 2017 to May 18, 2019. A sequel manga titled Iwa-Kakeru!! Try a new climbing was launched via Cycomi on June 8, 2019. ====Volume list==== =====Iwa-Kakeru! Climbing Girls===== =====Iwa-Kakeru!! Try a new climbing===== ===Anime=== On April 24, 2020, an anime television series adaptation was announced. The series is animated by Blade and directed by Tetsurō Amino, with Touko Machida handling series composition, Yoshihiro Watanabe designing the characters, and Tsubasa Ito composing the series' music. It premiered on October 4, 2020 on ABC's new anime block "ANiMAZiNG!!!". Aina Suzuki performed the opening theme , while Sumire Uesaka, Yui Ishikawa, Suzuki, and Miyu Tomita performed the ending "LET'S CLIMB↑" as their respective characters. Crunchyroll is streaming the series in North America, Central America, South America, Europe, Africa, Oceania, the Middle East, and the Commonwealth of Independent States. In South Asia and Southeast Asia, the series is licensed by Medialink. The series will run for 12 episodes. ====Episode list==== ==Notes== ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Anime series based on manga Category:Asahi Broadcasting Corporation original programming Category:Cygames franchises Category:Japanese webcomics Category:Kodansha manga Category:Shogakukan manga Category:Shōnen manga Category:Sports anime and manga Category:Webcomics in print Category:Works about climbing
title: Iwa-Kakeru! Climbing Girls
